sense.name: decreasing
sense.commentary: REDUCTION[+event] The act of becoming smaller, lower, less important, less complex, etc. Can occur with or without an agent.
sense.examples: The reduction of voting age to eighteen was supposed to have caused politicians to pay attention to young people. The reduction of resolution to 200 x 600 might make your image a little unclear. John's reduction of the complex political situation to a simple "us against them" viewpoint won him the election. Unfortunately, the last few days has seen a major price reduction for several stocks.

sense.name: electron transfer
sense.commentary: REDUCTION[+event] Probably a rare sense. The gaining of an electron by an atom. The opposite of oxidation.
sense.examples: My teacher gave me a set of oxidation-reduction reaction problems for homework. The element that gained electrons was said to have undergone reduction.
